alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 6:01PM MDT until July 08 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR NORTHERN LIBERTY AND EAST CENTRAL TOOLE COUNTIES... At 600 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles north of Chester, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Liberty and east central Toole Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
